statements: SELECT * FROM routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT start_location, end_location, distance FROM routes WHERE traffic_conditions = 'Heavy';
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance, average_speed FROM routes WHERE average_speed > 50;
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE distance BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, traffic_conditions FROM routes WHERE start_location = 'City A' ORDER BY traffic_conditions DESC;
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY start_location ASC, end_location DESC
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE traffic_conditions = 'Heavy traffic'
SELECT route_id, end_location, average_speed FROM routes WHERE start_location LIKE 'New%' OR start_location LIKE 'Old%'
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE distance < 50 AND traffic_conditions IN ('Light traffic', 'Medium traffic')
SELECT AVG(distance) AS avg_distance, MAX(average_speed) AS max_speed FROM routes
SELECT * FROM Routes;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM Routes ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT start_location, end_location, distance FROM Routes WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT route_id, start_location, delivery_status FROM Routes JOIN Deliveries ON Routes.route_id = Deliveries.route_id;
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_time, delivery_status FROM Deliveries WHERE delivery_status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM Routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY start_location ASC;
SELECT delivery_id, route_id, delivery_time FROM Deliveries WHERE delivery_status = 'pending' ORDER BY delivery_time DESC;
SELECT start_location, end_location, distance FROM Routes WHERE start_location LIKE 'New%' OR end_location LIKE '%City' ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT delivery_id, route_id, delivery_status FROM Deliveries WHERE delivery_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT delivery_id, route_id, delivery_time, delivery_status FROM Deliveries WHERE route_id IN (SELECT route_id FROM Routes WHERE distance < 50);
SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT route_id, origin, destination, distance FROM routes WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT * FROM deliveries ORDER BY delivery_time DESC;
SELECT origin, destination, distance FROM routes WHERE origin = 'New York';
SELECT route_id, delivery_id, analysis_result FROM historical_data WHERE analysis_result LIKE '%successful%';
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE origin = 'New York';
SELECT route_id, distance FROM routes WHERE destination = 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT routes.route_id, deliveries.delivery_time, deliveries.delivery_status FROM routes JOIN deliveries ON routes.route_id = deliveries.route_id;
SELECT AVG(distance) AS average_distance FROM routes;

SELECT routes.route_id, deliveries.delivery_time, historical_data.analysis_result FROM routes JOIN deliveries ON routes.route_id = deliveries.route_id JOIN historical_data ON deliveries.delivery_id = historical_data.delivery_id WHERE deliveries.delivery_status = 'Delivered';
SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT route_name, distance_km FROM routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_date, delivery_status FROM deliveries ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT route_id, delivery_date, delivery_time FROM deliveries WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered';
SELECT route_id, average_delivery_time_minutes FROM optimization_data WHERE average_delivery_time_minutes > 30;
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, distance_km FROM routes WHERE distance_km > 50;
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_date, delivery_status FROM deliveries WHERE delivery_status = 'delivered';
SELECT D.delivery_id, D.delivery_date, D.delivery_time, H.delivery_duration_minutes FROM deliveries D JOIN delivery_history H ON D.delivery_id = H.delivery_id;
SELECT R.route_name, O.average_delivery_time_minutes FROM routes R JOIN optimization_data O ON R.route_id = O.route_id ORDER BY O.average_delivery_time_minutes DESC;
SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_date, delivery_status FROM deliveries WHERE delivery_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT truck_id, truck_type, truck_capacity FROM truck_inventory WHERE availability_status = TRUE;
SELECT route_id, schedule_date, start_time, end_time FROM driver_schedule ORDER BY schedule_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE end_location = 'City A';
SELECT delivery_date, delivery_status FROM deliveries WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered' ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT truck_id, truck_type, truck_capacity FROM truck_inventory WHERE availability_status = TRUE;
SELECT driver_id, route_id, schedule_date, start_time, end_time FROM driver_schedule ORDER BY schedule_date, start_time;
